name: Cooling
description:
Semi interactive shader experiment. Seek and discover various forms and rythms. Listen to your music for a full immersive experience. Inspired by the undrop experimental piece 1/1 Oups. 

In a quest of daily coding, I am exploring the z layer as a personal dimension to create worlds and archetypes. Living the question, some daily experiments are minted, some are burnt, some are just twitted. This got small traction and a <3 from John Maeda (My Idol).

2 piece edition + 1 artist piece edition.
